Oh my lord! this literally defines the number one game. I recently got a 3 day ban on Roblox for what the moderators claim "Harassing" When I literally just greeted somebody, After suffering two days without entertainment, I tried checking on steam to see if there are any other entertaining games and then I stumble upon rec room. This platform's Moderation is dozens of times better than Roblox's Moderation. The lowest ban time from Roblox used to be 1 hour, but now, Roblox changed it to a day, Meanwhile Rec Room's lowest ban time is only a few minutes and it is rare to get a suspension over a few days. I don't think I'm gonna leave this game, even if I get unbanned from Roblox.

Moral of this comment: Screw you Roblox, Hello Rec Room!

negative.review:
As a veteran player of 2018 (13th of December i signed up)

I think this game had everything and lost it all.

"Golden era" 2018-2022 (As a lot of veteran player's describe it including myself)
The golden era of rec room was the era where rec room was constantly improving and had a non to minimum toxic community, the games were good, the lobby's were social, it was ORIGINAL. That is what made rec room stand out, it's originality and community, Game's were super creative, costumes were easy to play for, not grind.
Overall what rec room put on paper, seemed to be true. it was great.

"Fall of rec room" 2022-2025
In late 2022 rec room prices for tokens became higher and higher, it was dealable with for sure but was disappointing, then moderation got seemly worse and worse, more toxic player's would join lobby's to purposely ruin them, only vote-kicking was our saviour.

As the year's continued prices became incredibly high, AI slop took over artist's work. Player base continued to become toxic and younger, moderation became horrible, Toddler's would scream down the microphone in lobby's, people would be harassed for being "broke" to being a different skin colour.

The game obviously started to fall apart entirely. As the game got worse and worse, the originality that once was housed in rec room, dispersed into nothingness. The developer's would try to impress investor's rather than listen and support the community they built.

Eventually rec room's idea's got too big for it's head and they ended up firing a lot of their staff. The company who made rec room, (Against Gravity Corp) would hit US $3.5 billion.

They made the mark on their economy at the expense of their player base. It no longer has the spark it once promised to hold for the community.

I do not recommend this game to anyone.

the game use to be great, but started falling off in 2023, here are the following ways the game can be improved

Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
Better optimization
And also be cheaper with your items (optional)

there is nobody playing this game with vr headsets. it used to be rare to see someone without a headset now its rare to SEE someone having vr! where did they all go? plus the people playing this game just stare at themselves for hours in the mirror. i wish it can come back like the old days.

pack it up at this point this game fell off HARD
it was the best game i ever played when i was younger spending most of my free time playing this game but now it just has just rotted away, now a husk of its prime self.
i wish they just put it down soon and put this desecrated game to rest at last.

this game was the best game, i'd stay up on my quest 2 on winter nights till 3 am, and sometimes usually even pull all-nighters, i'd run from school to my quest 2 just to play rec room, the friends i met, and the fun game selection. the game had good games, but after 2023 the game jsut started getting worse, they started adding stuff the community never wants, the game has just became more soulless and soulless, i've met most of my best online friends on this game, and watching the game i adored, loved, and would ruin my sleep schedule for has slowly became the most boring game ever, they prioritize community creations and UGC instead of actual gameplay features. Most games you see are just ignited games, random bad AI slop games, and have a more toxic community, they made a AI companion which is useless, and the last time i played was a few months ago, i messed aroudn with the makerpen and played games, the games have become more boring and rec room has nothing new, every major updates comes with alot of issues that they take a long time to fix (usually) and the most useless stuff, the only good update was the new paintball update, which i haven't even tried yet. but its probably a bad map, its really upsetting me to watch one the best games in the universe to slowly transform into this soulless, UGC. AI filled game with only the intent to gain money off of it. the developers just dont care about their community anymore. they only work on the game for the money, the only time rec room had a good update which i think the last one was the infinite ink for rooms 1 and not making rooms 2 the default was the last one, but the developers only added that just because they realized their player base was losing popularity, and everything is overpriced in-game, so many stuff are overpriced, if i go onto the game and see the newest cosmetics they'd cost more than 2k, i've stopped playing this game because all of this nonsense. and the unoptimized UI and everything. im not even going to bother playing the game because i know it'll be filled with a racist, toxic community. and slop games. they prioritize making their UGC and features that are dependent on the player base itself. they dont even care about the average players experience in the game anymore, just for the money, don't play this game unless you want a knock-off roblox game.
I would not recommend playing recreational enclosed space, as it got my son arrested by a corrupt cop selling fentanyl through public lobbies

this game basically went to shit due to the devs being greedy by doubling the prices of all cosmetics and bullshit subscriptions, letting go half of their team this year, and turning everything into ai investmentslop. this game had a good run during the quest standalone era, but now the player count has dropped tenfold since last year. i still play this game only cuz me and my old buddies sometimes hang out and exploit in lobbies since this game has one of the bottom five most shittiest anti-cheats known to man.

I Joined in december 2019, this game was a truly good experience back in the day up until around 2022, this game is just a husk of what it once was and feels more like a roblox competitor for its own sake then anything else. Please do not play I cannot recommend it unless you have been playing for a while and still have freinds on there.

I've been playing rec room for the past 3 years ago and nothing has ever changed for the game. And its community ha been toxic alot of times. Yet we live in a society to where all the people don't trust each other because they either have a low social ethnic, or just taunting people for no reason of it. I mean, I loved Rec Room in my entire life until this went to downhill that Rec Room decided to start laying off the staff and does not do anything for its own community. 

The community does often express its concerns about the endangerment of children on this platform. If you are a parent and you have a child that is playing rec room, I would put up a junior account or remove its privileges from playing it. I do express my concerns about rec room and hope that they can either listen to the community or not. But if company games can do something better for their own communitys, then so can rec room can. 

I wouldn't recommend playing this game since this have begun to fall short from pure joy to hateful arguments. Even if the environment of rec room begins to soften up slowly, there still toxicity in Rec Room. Pretty sure that the game in the future is going to get shut down.

As a veteran player of 2018 (13th of December i signed up)

I think this game had everything and lost it all.

"Golden era" 2018-2022 (As a lot of veteran player's describe it including myself)
The golden era of rec room was the era where rec room was constantly improving and had a non to minimum toxic community, the games were good, the lobby's were social, it was ORIGINAL. That is what made rec room stand out, it's originality and community, Game's were super creative, costumes were easy to play for, not grind.
Overall what rec room put on paper, seemed to be true. it was great.

"Fall of rec room" 2022-2025
In late 2022 rec room prices for tokens became higher and higher, it was dealable with for sure but was disappointing, then moderation got seemly worse and worse, more toxic player's would join lobby's to purposely ruin them, only vote-kicking was our saviour.

As the year's continued prices became incredibly high, AI slop took over artist's work. Player base continued to become toxic and younger, moderation became horrible, Toddler's would scream down the microphone in lobby's, people would be harassed for being "broke" to being a different skin colour.

The game obviously started to fall apart entirely. As the game got worse and worse, the originality that once was housed in rec room, dispersed into nothingness. The developer's would try to impress investor's rather than listen and support the community they built.

Eventually rec room's idea's got too big for it's head and they ended up firing a lot of their staff. The company who made rec room, (Against Gravity Corp) would hit US $3.5 billion.

They made the mark on their economy at the expense of their player base. It no longer has the spark it once promised to hold for the community.

I do not recommend this game to anyone.

This game has destroyed its reputation.

-Over the top moderation
-Voice moderation AI which is very strict and suppressive when it comes to socialising in public areas
-Mass amounts of micro transactions that pop up like Youtube Ads
-A community full of children that will call you slurs of all sorts
-For every 1 good decision a million bad decisions follow
-Taking away many avenues for creators to make money
-Making respected and talented creators walk away from the game after slop games are more promoted 
-Allowing slop creators to published copyrighted rooms with zero talent or creative aspects
-Following the Roblox formula and not branching into their own game
-Valuing investors more than the player-base
-Only care for players when they lose money
-Firing developers who were passionate and involved within the community
-Allegedly treating employees poorly (Dev source)
-Awful contests that have been lead with awful decisions and results recently
-Pushing AI tools over creativity

This game is free, but at what cost? The only fun to be had is trolling, but even that is a task because of the stupid moderation AI.

2018 was probably the best time to play this game- every year after kept adding new content that would gloss over one another until essentially making the game a mess of old bugs unresolved, lag, crashing, getting kicked from a room for no reason, and other fun stuff... Normally I'd play this game to work on building projects or play the "rec original paintball," but after time passed any actual game is just super buggy and or prone to crash. I've had multiple times when I was building in a room- until I was suddenly kicked-instantly loosing all my progress because the "auto save feature" is a myth.
